title: Cowboys and Saints on TNF, Bills and Patriots fight for AFC, and Steelers want music at practice
itunes:title: Cowboys and Saints on TNF, Bills and Patriots fight for AFC, and Steelers want music at practice
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson look ahead to Thursday Night Football between the Cowboys and Saints. Dallas is facing plenty of challenges while the Saints aren't sure who will be their QB. The AFC lead is on the line when the Bills host the Patriots on Monday Night Football. The Steelers have dropped two in a row and WR Chase Claypool is talking about the lack of music when Pittsburgh practices. The crew asks which non-division leader is playing the best right now before Kay answers some 'Which Guy Wednesday' questions for Fantasy Football.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
